name: Felt Tip Circus
description: Welcome to the smallest show on Earth! The lights are bright. The tension, real. The audience, demanding, even if they are made of wood. Now itâ€™s your turn to compete in the greatest contest of skill ever to grace the miniature world of toys, trinkets and plain old junk!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 3770k (or equivalent) Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Love the game and love the art style. The atmosphere at the beginning when you're in the house is great. The mini-games are fun and offer decent replay value to get good at them. Yes the game is a bit short and shallow for what it offers but the game is also priced pretty fair for what it offers.  This would be a good family game for the local co-op, and I think its a pretty good first VR game to show people as the environments are nice and the mini games are easy to understand.  I would LOVE if they kept adding onto this with the same atmosphere and art style
has a lot of potential!  but its really unfinished over 2 weeks no update from dev not worth 10$ as it is right now
